item.description:
Hi all,

Here is a ride that I am organizing to share some of the planning with Bethany. 
 

These 2 routes start in Franklin and go through Wrentham, Sheldonville, and Cumberland, Rhode Island.  It is a pretty ride with no too much traffic (except the 1st mile).   

The longer one is 27 miles (click for map) and the short one is closer to 20 miles (click for map).   There is a hill on the way down and the way back.... but other than that a few small rolling hills. 
 

Afterwards, there is Joe's American Bar & Grille on King's Street where we can have a well deserved beverage.
 

Let's meet at the Parmenter School.  Get off Rt 495 at King Street and head towards Franklin Center.  Take your 2nd left on to Wachusett Street and park at the 2nd lot. 
 

Thanks, Karen
item.name: RESCHEDULED!! KAREN'S DEBUT: Franklin Loops - 2 options
